p: A similar approach was recently undertaken in a study of 86 patients with PD and 161 controls, in which a panel of genetic variants in APP processing genes was investigated [ 39]. The authors did not find an association between BACE1 polymorphisms and PD compared to controls. However, prior multiple comparison correction results showed an association between APP processing genes and PD compared to controls. Furthermore, the authors showed a significant association between two SNPs in APP (rs466448) and APH1B (rs2068143) and CSF A Î²42 levels in patients with PD [ 39]. Taken together, this previous study and the results presented here suggest that variants in APP processing pathway genes may play a biological role in PD.
